text: Eghtɨ gɨn men afeziaba ko men tuebaba izɨva me bagh azangsɨgh en atartɨ, e kamaghɨn me mɨkɨmam, ‘E kamaghsua ia Benjaminɨn anabamɨn gumazibar apangkuvigh guiviba men takigh. E me ko mɨdorozir kam gamigha uan guivitam me danɨngan anogoroke. Guizbangɨra, me ian guiviba ini, ezɨ ia uari uan guiviba me ganɨngizir puvatɨ, kamaghɨn, ia uan akar dɨkɨrɨzim abɨghizir puvatɨ.’ ”21:22 Hibrun akam kagh akam deragha anebɨghizir puvatɨ.
